courseTitle: Data Science with Python: From Basics to Applications

modules.description: Introduce fundamental concepts of data science, including basic statistics and data types.

submodules.name: What is Data Science?
submodules.description: Overview of the field and career opportunities.
submodules.videoLecture: Introduction to the interdisciplinary field of Data Science, covering data-driven decision making, roles, and impact.

quiz.question: What are common roles in a data science team?

submodules.name: Basic Statistics
submodules.description: Learn mean, median, mode, and standard deviation.
submodules.videoLecture: Explains descriptive statistics with hands-on examples in Python.

modules.assignment: Analyze a small dataset and compute basic statistical measures using Python.

modules.description: Explore data ingestion, cleaning, and visualization using pandas and matplotlib.

submodules.name: Working with CSV Files
submodules.description: Read and manipulate CSV data using pandas.
submodules.videoLecture: Demonstrates loading, inspecting, and filtering CSV datasets in Python.

quiz.question: Which library is commonly used to read CSV files in Python?

submodules.name: Data Cleaning Techniques
submodules.description: Handle missing values, outliers, and formatting issues.
submodules.videoLecture: Teaches techniques for dealing with nulls, duplicates, and inconsistent data.

quiz.question: What method fills missing values in pandas?

modules.assignment: Clean a messy dataset and visualize key insights using Python libraries.

modules.description: Introduce basic ML concepts, models, and use cases.

submodules.name: Supervised Learning Basics
submodules.description: Understand regression and classification with examples.
submodules.videoLecture: Covers linear regression and logistic classification problems with scikit-learn.

quiz.question: Which algorithm is used for classification?

submodules.name: Model Evaluation
submodules.description: Assess model performance using accuracy and confusion matrix.
submodules.videoLecture: Demonstrates evaluation metrics and cross-validation in practice.

quiz.question: What does a confusion matrix show?

modules.assignment: Build a simple classifier using scikit-learn and evaluate it on test data.

capstoneProject.title: Build a Data Science Pipeline
capstoneProject.description: Create a complete pipeline from data ingestion to ML model deployment on a real-world dataset.
